Hello to anyone that sees this Blog! This is the STA-Blog (Station Tera-Alpha Web Log), this Blog is in association with the Station Tera-Alpha WebSite, and the Station Tera-Alpha Paranormal, and Station Tera-Alpha Sci-Fi Anime & Manga MSN Groups. You can subscribe to either of these MSN Groups by just entering your E-Mail into the corisponding Subscription form to the Right (in the "sidebar"). You can get to the Main Site from the Link at the bottom of this Blog.

Hey all I have put up the new STA-Blog News Rotator on the MSN groups and the STA-Main Web site home page! Now all the posts & comments posted to the STA-Blog will rotate on the top 3 STA web sites! I will put a rotator on the Yahoo group and try to find some other Affiliates and sites I can add one too. I will soon be starting the News Letter back up, and it (of course) will also be available from the STA-Blog. I would love your comments and info so I can mae the New version of the News Letter the Best of all!

Check it out! this is an awsome site with hundreds of Anime Fan-Fics from Akira to Zoids, and more! urlLink FanFiction.net... Hello to all! I have finaly caught up to the whole Blogging thing LOL... I will be working on this new feature of Station Tera-Alpha for a while to get it to where I like the formatting and features. If anyone has any suggestions, comments, or creative ideas for this new addition to STA then feel free to Post a Blog, or message to one of the groups. Thanks for being such great Members!

From: DARGONTera-Alpha (Original Message) Sent: 7/27/2002 10:16 AM We are looking for some Members that can write more full-length reviews, if you are interested please post a reply to this message. If you want an example of what we are looking for take a look at the Anime' Info Center and click on one of the Titles. Also, if you happen to know of any Anime or Sci-Fi related Terms and there discriptions that can be added to the Sci-Fi/Anime Commonly Used Terms page let me know
